required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Bioequivalence of a Fixed Dose Combination Tablet of Empagliflozin/Metformin Extended Release Compared With Mono Compound Tablets in Healthy Male and Female
clinical_study.official_title: Bioequivalence of a Fixed Dose Combination Tablet of Empagliflozin/Metformin Extended Release (10 mg/1000 mg) Compared With the Free Combination of Empagliflozin and Metformin Extended Release Tablets in Healthy Subjects Following a High-fat, High-caloric Meal (an Open-label, Randomised, Single Dose, Crossover Trial)

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this trial is to investigate bioequivalence of a newly developed fixed dose combination (FDC) tablet containing empagliflozin and metformin extended release compared to the free combination of empagliflozin and metformin extended release under fed conditions.

primary_outcome.time_frame: -1:00 hour(h) before the drug administration and 0:30h, 1:00h, 1:30h, 2:00h, 2:30h, 3:00h, 4:00h, 5:00h, 6:00h, 7:00h, 8:00h, 10:00h, 12:00h, 24:00h, 34:00h, 48:00h and 72:00h after drug administration
primary_outcome.description: Area under the concentration-time curve of empagliflozin in plasma over the time interval from 0 to the time of the last quantifiable concentration (AUC0-tz)

primary_outcome.description: Area under the concentration-time curve of metformin in plasma over the time interval from 0 to the time of the last quantifiable concentration (AUC0-tz)

primary_outcome.description: Maximum measured concentration of the empagliflozin in plasma

primary_outcome.description: Maximum measured concentration of the metformin in plasma

secondary_outcome.time_frame: -1:00 hour(h) before the drug administration and 0:30h, 1:00h, 1:30h, 2:00h, 2:30h, 3:00h, 4:00h, 5:00h, 6:00h, 7:00h, 8:00h, 10:00h, 12:00h, 24:00h, 34:00h, 48:00h and 72:00h after drug administration
secondary_outcome.description: Area under the concentration-time curve of the analyte in plasma over the time interval from 0 extrapolated to infinity.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: -1:00 hour(h) before the drug administration and 0:30h, 1:00h, 1:30h, 2:00h, 2:30h, 3:00h, 4:00h, 5:00h, 6:00h, 7:00h, 8:00h, 10:00h, 12:00h, 24:00h, 34:00h, 48:00h and 72:00h after drug administration
secondary_outcome.description: Area under the concentration-time curve of the analyte in plasma over the time interval from 0 extrapolated to infinity.

intervention.description: single dose of metformin given as tablets
Single dose empagliflozin/metformin given as fixed-dose combination tablet
single dose of empagliflozin given as tablet

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion criteria:
- Healthy male and female subjects
- age of 18 to 55 years
- body mass index (BMI) of 18.5 to 29.9 kg/m2
- additional inclusion criteria may apply
Exclusion criteria:
- Any finding in the medical examination (including BP, PR or ECG) deviating from normal and judged as clinically relevant by the investigator
- Repeated measurement of systolic blood pressure outside the range of 90 to 140 mmHg or diastolic blood pressure outside the range of 50 to 90 mmHg or pulse rate outside the range of 45 to 90 bpm
- Any laboratory value outside the reference range that the investigator considers to be of clinical relevance
- Any evidence of a concomitant disease judged as clinically relevant by the investigator
- Gastrointestinal, hepatic, renal, respiratory, cardiovascular, metabolic, immunological or hormonal disorders
- Surgery of the gastrointestinal tract that could interfere with kinetics of the trial medication
- Diseases of the central nervous system (including but not limited to any kind of seizures and stroke), and other relevant neurological disorders or psychiatric disorders
- additional exclusion criteria may apply

participant_flow.pre_assignment_details: This was an open-label, randomised, 2-way crossover trial with 2 treatments (T and R) and 2 treatment sequences (T_R and R_T). Trial drug administrations of the 2 single dose treatments were separated by a washout period of at least 7 days.

group.title: Fed 10mg+1000mg Fixed Dose Combination (FDC)/Single (TR)
group.description: Subjects received in period 1 a single dose of 10 mg empagliflozin/1000 mg metformin hydrochloride (HCl) extended release (XR) (1 tablet) with 240 mL of water after intake of a high-fat, high-caloric meal, followed in period 2 with a single dose of 10 mg empagliflozin (1 tablet) together with 1000 mg metformin HCl XR (2 tablets) with 240 mL of water after intake of a high-fat, high-caloric meal. 2 treatments separated by a wash-out period of at least 7 days.

group.title: Fed 10mg+1000mg Single/FDC (RT)
group.description: Subjects received in period 1 a single dose of 10 mg empagliflozin (1 tablet) together with 1000 mg metformin HCl XR (2 tablets) with 240 mL of water after intake of a high-fat, high-caloric meal, followed in period 2 with a single dose of 10 mg empagliflozin/1000 mg metformin HCl XR (1 tablet) with 240 mL of water after intake of a high-fat, high-caloric meal. 2 treatments separated by a wash-out period of at least 7 days.

baseline.population: Treated set (TS): The TS was made up of all randomised subjects who were documented to have received the trial medication.

group.title: Fed 10mg+1000mg FDC/Single (TR)
group.description: Subjects received in period 1 a single dose of 10 mg empagliflozin/1000 mg metformin hydrochloride (HCl) extended release (XR) (1 tablet) with 240 mL of water after intake of a high-fat, high-caloric meal, followed in period 2 with a single dose of 10 mg empagliflozin (1 tablet) together with 1000 mg metformin HCl XR (2 tablets) with 240 mL of water after intake of a high-fat, high-caloric meal. 2 treatments separated by a wash-out period of at least 7 days.

group.title: Fed 10mg+1000mg Single/FDC (RT)
group.description: Subjects received in period 1 a single dose of 10 mg empagliflozin (1 tablet) together with 1000 mg metformin HCl XR (2 tablets) with 240 mL of water after intake of a high-fat, high-caloric meal, followed in period 2 with a single dose of 10 mg empagliflozin/1000 mg metformin HCl XR (1 tablet) with 240 mL of water after intake of a high-fat, high-caloric meal. 2 treatments separated by a wash-out period of at least 7 days.

outcome.title: AUC0-tz of Empagliflozin in Plasma
outcome.description: Area under the concentration-time curve of empagliflozin in plasma over the time interval from 0 to the time of the last quantifiable concentration (AUC0-tz)
outcome.time_frame: -1:00 hour(h) before the drug administration and 0:30h, 1:00h, 1:30h, 2:00h, 2:30h, 3:00h, 4:00h, 5:00h, 6:00h, 7:00h, 8:00h, 10:00h, 12:00h, 24:00h, 34:00h, 48:00h and 72:00h after drug administration
outcome.population: Pharmacokinetic set (PKS) included all treated subjects that provided at least 1 observation for at least 1 primary endpoint without important protocol violations with respect to the statistical evaluation of the pharmacokinetic endpoints.

group.title: Fed 10mg+ 1000mg FDC (T)
group.description: Subjects received a single dose of 10 mg empagliflozin/1000 mg metformin HCl XR (1 tablet) with 240 mL of water after intake of a high-fat, high-caloric meal.

group.title: Fed 10mg+1000mg Single (R)
group.description: Subjects received a single dose of 10 mg empagliflozin (1 tablet) together with a single dose of 1000 mg metformin HCl XR (2 tablets) with 240 mL of water after intake of a high-fat, high-caloric meal.

measure.title: AUC0-tz of Empagliflozin in Plasma
measure.description: Area under the concentration-time curve of empagliflozin in plasma over the time interval from 0 to the time of the last quantifiable concentration (AUC0-tz)
measure.population: Pharmacokinetic set (PKS) included all treated subjects that provided at least 1 observation for at least 1 primary endpoint without important protocol violations with respect to the statistical evaluation of the pharmacokinetic endpoints.

analysis.non_inferiority_desc: The assessment of bioequivalence was based on 2-sided 90% CIs for the ratios (test to reference treatment) of the adjusted gMeans of the primary endpoints, with acceptance range of 80.00 to 125.00 %.
analysis.method_desc: ANOVA model on the logarithmic scale including random effects for ‘subjects within sequences’ & fixed effect for ‘sequence’, ‘period’ & ‘treatment’.
analysis.estimate_desc: Relative bioavailability of empagliflozin was estimated by the adjusted gMean ratio of Fed 10mg+1000mg FDC divided by Fed 10mg+1000mg Single. Standard deviation is actually intraindividual geometric coefficient variation (gCV).

outcome.title: AUC0-tz of Metformin in Plasma
outcome.description: Area under the concentration-time curve of metformin in plasma over the time interval from 0 to the time of the last quantifiable concentration (AUC0-tz)
outcome.time_frame: -1:00 hour(h) before the drug administration and 0:30h, 1:00h, 1:30h, 2:00h, 2:30h, 3:00h, 4:00h, 5:00h, 6:00h, 7:00h, 8:00h, 10:00h, 12:00h, 24:00h, 34:00h, 48:00h and 72:00h after drug administration

group.title: Fed 10mg+ 1000mg FDC (T)
group.description: Subjects received a single dose of 10 mg empagliflozin/1000 mg metformin HCl XR (1 tablet) with 240 mL of water after intake of a high-fat, high-caloric meal.

group.title: Fed 10mg+1000mg Single (R)
group.description: Subjects received a single dose of 10 mg empagliflozin (1 tablet) together with a single dose of 1000 mg metformin HCl XR (2 tablets) with 240 mL of water after intake of a high-fat, high-caloric meal.

measure.title: AUC0-tz of Metformin in Plasma
measure.description: Area under the concentration-time curve of metformin in plasma over the time interval from 0 to the time of the last quantifiable concentration (AUC0-tz)

analysis.non_inferiority_desc: The assessment of bioequivalence was based on 2-sided 90% confidence intervals (CIs) for the ratios (test to reference treatment) of the adjusted geometric means (gMeans) of the primary endpoints,using an acceptance range of 80.00 to 125.00 %.
analysis.method_desc: ANOVA model on the logarithmic scale including random effects for ‘subjects within sequences’ & fixed effect for ‘sequence’, ‘period’ & ‘treatment’.
analysis.estimate_desc: Relative bioavailability of metformin was estimated by the adjusted gMean ratio of Fed 10mg+1000mg FDC divided by Fed 10mg+1000mg Single. Standard deviation is actually intraindividual geometric coefficient variation (gCV).

certain_agreements.pi_employee: All Principal Investigators ARE employed by the organization sponsoring the study.
certain_agreements.restrictive_agreement: There is NOT an agreement between Principal Investigators and the Sponsor (or its agents) that restricts the PI's rights to discuss or publish trial results after the trial is completed.
